documents.document: Gah, now I read it properly (was in a tush to go somewhere at the time), it's just a security update.

*gets email survey from @BelvoirUK*
Excellent! Finally get to give feedback on how bad they were.
*reads*
Bah! Just marketing stuff!
I suspect uptimed(8) and uprecords have a slight issue. It’s the same on my Macbook too. https://t.co/X2OkQAiyrY
Dropbox Paper looks very interesting. Not *new*, but interesting. Has a vague Wave feel. LaTeX support looks fun.
I think I found the tool that originally inspired me to write uptimes.el. *installs on stuff* https://t.co/XJvouuBUTv
Just noticed that the @github Wiki help on making links doesn’t seem to match how they work (1st and 3rd anyway). https://t.co/ePyHzmcc2m
Of course, yesterday’s iMac GNU emacs uptime celebration was short lived, thanks to macOS 10.12.3 turning up. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
@seensedotcom After reboot for today’s macOS update, everything but Google Music will hide now. Can’t get hide menu from that.
Can't imagine why I love her so much. Nope. Struggling to think of a reason. https://t.co/xD2cE9jhcD

Wondering if the last option is Google checking if I'm some sort of deity... https://t.co/WPxox61XD0
@0rangelic *looks outside* Clear and cold. It's safe to get off the sofa.
Got @0rangelic to sit through The Force Awakens. She's now seen five Star Wars movies!
@_conorsh I found myself following both. Looking around others saw that effect too. Kind of makes sense, I guess.
I should make the effort to get out in a morning, now and again: https://t.co/I1Cx4SrWPQ

*checks*
She still hasn’t done it! https://t.co/sxVPOEDrwL
New t-shirt purchase has just turned up. https://t.co/Ud7MW6QRuC
Oh, right, yeah, that account has changed hands hasn't it? *fixes that* https://t.co/894hbz2w47
Yeah, this is how we end up with the Dredd universe isn't it? https://t.co/vN34IA4wGq
Currently trying to uninstall Photoshop CC from the iMac. So far had to upgrade two parts of it. Still no uninstall option. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Discovered https://t.co/AHH99EWTGZ and Barsoom this morning. Was pretty much an instant purchase. Both iMac and Macbook are using them now.
@seensedotcom Heh! That'll explain why I missed it. ;-) Will do (will be a couple or so hours). Loving Menubar Stats and Barsoom. Good job.
@seensedotcom Ahh hah! Not near machines right this moment but I'll try that later. My apologies, didn't notice this when checking website.
@seensedotcom brings up no menu. Works wonders on almost everything else.
@seensedotcom Is there a known problem hiding some individual icons with Barsoom? GDrive one example I'm struggling with. Ctrl+Cmd+RClick...
Alexa, play some U2 #photoblog https://t.co/gCl8zJ8uRY
I knew she'd get me involved in the downfall of society... https://t.co/TiyosQwuS8
Kind of annoyed that it's taken me 49 years to discover Barr's Lemonade.
@coopuk I ate all my fruit and was rewarded with a spork. In retrospect I think it’s rather clever. ;)
@coopuk Just giggle, it was funny. ;-)
The @coopuk have obviously turned evil, if this is how they're packing sporks from now on! 😮 https://t.co/YowEeIy4HP

Yeah, thanks for that Alexa! (Asked Google the same question, on voice, got full instructions). https://t.co/8pfImB5Okt
I guess https://t.co/sCiOlnBEIq explains phone battery issue in past 24 hours. Curious how neither app showed up as high power user.
Thing is, I code lots on it, have emacs running 24/7, terminals all over. Stuff like that never shows as a memory hog. NOT EVEN EMACS!
iMac getting slow again. Problems? Keeping notes, todo list, bit of web browsing, twitter. Glad I don’t do anything… https://t.co/cvkSeNzh9w
@0rangelic @BoyCalledSue *makes plans from “Bloke from Elbow snogging Trump” Photoshop, to really mess with you*
@0rangelic @BoyCalledSue I saw the picture of him you were looking at earlier. Not sure it’s “loathe” to be honest. :P
Odder and odder. After failing to fully charge last night, and then showing it’d run out in an hour, phone now showing about 13 hours to go.
Phone has been on mains charge all night. O_o https://t.co/azUc8wp35N

Every damn time: iTunes: “Want to update your iPod to new version!”
*lets it*
iTunes: “Yay! Now can I update it to the same version?"
AWS ID verification won’t call my phone. If I click ‘Phone’ in attached it… wants to ID verify first. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ https://t.co/3e0jbUaAF1
So, yes, I’d at least train ride 500 miles. But ideally not 500 more; that’d have been exhausting.
Stats from taking @VolcanicArts home the other day. https://t.co/j9MebVQY28
@russell …I do tend to scan lots on the iMac. I’m wondering if the leak is to do with how images get pulled into Evernote.

@russell OMG CHAT IN A NOTE APP WHO NEEDS HANGOUTS AND SKYPE AND SLACK AND STUFF?!?
Oddly, it’s fine on Macbook. But...
I’m not saying that @evernote has a memory leak, but… Kinda looks like a memory leak doesn’t it?

iMac is sluggish. I check memory. @evernote is using 1.07 GB.
*restarts Evernote*
Now using 97.2 MB.
Machine is snappy again. O_o
Well damn. Just searching for something on the web (actually, on usenet), and I found out that Phil Barnett died last year. Well damn.
@pedantic_git It’s like a scene from GTA V, only with more chrome. https://t.co/Iffzup6Tcw

*looks around twitter*
Guess it’s up to me to wish Sir Isaac Newton a happy birthday then. ;)
